result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: St. John

Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla in court.  Attorney Joshua Ryan-Polczinski in court for Ever Francisco Sevilla.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Interpreter St. John in court and sworn by the clerk. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made.  Parties are jointly requesting reset. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.addlTxt:
2:38 PM (64-06) Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla in court.  Attorney Joshua Ryan-Polczinski in court for Ever Francisco Sevilla.  Attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for State of Wisconsin. Interpreter Saul Arteaga for defendant.
State called to the stand as a witness Whitewater Police Officer,  Anthony Heilberger.
Anthony Heilberger duly sworn by the clerk and testified on direct examination by ADA Herrmann. Witness identified the defendant in Court.
Exhibit #1 marked, identified and discussed. Exhibit #1 offered and received by the Court.
2:43PM - Cross examination by Attorney Ryan.
2:45PM -Re-direct by ADA Herrmann.
Evidence is closed.
2:47PM - Argument by the State. Requesting bind over.
2:50PM - Argument by the Defense. Objecting to bind over.
Court finds probable cause that a felony has been committed and that the defendant likely committed it and binds him over to stand trial on the charges. 
Arraignment held in open Court.
Attorney Ryan acknowledged the receipt of the Information, requesting the Court read the charges and penalties in Court. Attorney Ryan plead not guilty to the charge on behalf of his client.

Interpreter Sarah St. John present and sworn by clerk. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Preliminary hearing rights and information given, hearing requested, time limits waived.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla in court. Interpreter Arteaga previously sworn. Defendant may now qualify for SPD. Sarah St John

1:30 PM case called, Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla not in court. 
1:35 PM case re-called, Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla in court. Interpreter St John previously sworn. Defendant does not qualify for SPD. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Complaint read by court. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Prosecuting attorney JJ Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ever Francisco Sevilla in court. Interpreter St John previously sworn. Attorney Hagerman appeared specially. Right to attorney options form given; referred to State Public Defenders Office. Defendant does not qualify for SPD. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Complaint read by court. Defendant does not qualify since released. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.

Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
